Headline: #31 31st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 31st/Rhodes
ShortDescription: Westbound #31 31st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 31st, Vernon, 32nd, King drive, due to street blockage near 31st/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #31 31st buses are temporarily rerouted via Rhodes, 31st, Vernon, 32nd, King drive, then resume their normal route on 31st due to street blockage near 31st/Rhodes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses temp. rerouted SB Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn; NB State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn: near Kinzie/Dearborn..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Monroe
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Monroe due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Monroe due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
